Description : Poker Night 2 is a direct sequel to Poker Night at the Inventory. As in the previous section , the user plays against the famous heroes of video games. Initially, every player has the same supply of virtual currency , and the game goes by the rules of Texas Hold'em and Omaha. Like the original , the advances in Poker Night 2 provide access to additional content in another game - this time it's Borderlands 2 . There are additional bonuses depending on the platform - Steam users can open access to additional subjects in TF2.
